TextView.android:text: Hospital Name:
1. Is document related to procedure(s) of collection, identification, handling, safe transportation, processing and disposal of specimens available and properly documented?
2. Is document showing process addresses discharge of all patients including Medico-legal cases and patients leaving against medical advice available and properly documented?
3. Is document showing care of patients arriving in the emergency including handling of medico-legal cases available and properly documented?
4. Is document showing policies and procedures used to guide the rational use of blood and blood products available and properly documented?
5. Is document showing procedures to govern transfusion of blood and blood products available and properly documented?
6. Is document showing procedure for the administration of anaesthesia available and properly documented?
7. Is document showing defined criteria to transfer the patient from the recovery area available and properly documented?
8. Is document showing procedure of prevention of adverse events like wrong site, wrong patient and wrong surgery available and properly documented?
9. Is document showing procedure for incorporating purchase, storage, prescription and dispensation of medications available and properly documented?
10. Is document showing procedure to address procurement and usage of implantable prostheses available and properly documented?
11. Is document showing policies and procedure exit for storage of medications available and properly documented?
12. Is document showing policies and procedures to govern usage of radioactive drugs available and properly documented?
13. Is document showing Policies and procedures of safe storage, preparation, handling, distribution and disposal of radioactive drugs available and properly documented?
14. Is Infection control manual showing periodic update and surveillance activities available and properly documented?
15. Is document showing operational and maintenance (preventive and breakdown) plan for clinical and support service equipment available and properly documented?
16. Is document showing safe exit plan in case of fire and non-fire emergencies available and properly documented?
17. Is document showing well defined staff recruitment process available and properly documented?
18. Is document showing disciplinary and grievance handling procedure available and properly documented?
19. Is document showing policies and procedures for maintaining confidentiality, integrity and security of records, data and information available and properly documented?
20. Is document showing procedures of exist for retention time of medical records, data and information available and properly documented?
21. Is document showing define process to whom the patient record can be released available and properly documented?
22. Is document showing procedure on destruction of medical records available and properly documented?
